posts.title: How to Recover File after Shift+Delete
posts.text: The easiest way on WIN-10 to delete is Shift+Delete, as it won’t bother you to check each file and evacuate the recycle bin again.However, did you ever regret after pressing the Enter button? Well, this article provides a method without any recovery software Open the Registry:Start -> Run CMD -> regedit Expand the Registry term:HKEY_LOCAL_MACHIME/SOFTWARE/MicroSoft/WINDOWS/CURRENTVERSION/EXPLORER/DESKTOP/NameSpace New Key with Name 645FFO40—5081—101B—9F08—00AA002F954E* Rename the default main key with Recycle Bin then you’ll the file deleted by Shift+Delete in the Recycle Bin.

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
